history.narrative: Law 15-131, the “Neighborhood Investment Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-128, which was referred to the Committee on Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 2, 2003, and January 6, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 29, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-332 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-131 became effective on March 30, 2004.
